Northern Michigan's Premier Golf Course
Newberry Country Club, "
Your Public Upper Peninsula Golf Course"
The beauty of the Newberry Country Club envelopes an entire 200 acres of pristine woodlands, ponds, rolling hills, and streams.  This property is the perfect venue for your company functions, rehearsal dinners, birthdays, wakes, reunions, celebrations of life, and hospital presentations, just to name a few.  We are located just 45 minutes from the Mackinac Bridge, situated in the heart of Michigan's Upper Peninsula.  Bring your next UP event to a spectacular location that is founded in hospitality and surrounded in tranquility.
Indoor complex accommodates up to 75
Outdoor venue up to 300 guests
Catering services available for all types of groups
Beautiful views from every angle of the clubhouse
Gracious and friendly staff
Complimentary parking
Full bar service
Wedding consultations to help plan your event
200 acres of beautiful woodlands, ponds, rolling hills, and streams
Indoor & Outdoor Dining Experience
We have custom
Upper Peninsula wedding
packages to suit your needs.  The Newberry Country Club has a new stylish clubhouse, restaurant and lounge.  Your special event can enjoy all of these great amenities all within one property.  We can work with parties larger than seventy five guests by creating an outdoor venue.   Along with these quality features, you can also choose to enjoy a day of Group Golf and utilize all that our property has to offer.  We want your event to be successful and memorable, so please contact us today to plan for your once in a lifetime Upper Peninsula event.
Customize Your Event
Looking for the perfect place for your
Upper Peninsula Small Conference
or Upper Peninsula Business Meeting?  The Newberry Country Club has the property features to surely accommodate your needs.  Before or after the completion of your Upper Peninsula Conference or Meeting, guests can enjoy an afternoon of Group Golf, enjoying those "team building" skills that make every UP business flourish!
Small business meetings up to seventy five people can be facilitated within the clubhouse.  Larger groups can choose to include an outdoor venue to create the needed space for your gathering.
Let us customize your next event.  For more information, please contact Lance Byrns at
lance.byrns@yahoo.com
.

Newberry Country Club invites you to Contact Us with any requests, concerns, events, or questions.  Please utilize the form below so we can better serve you and make your Newberry Country Club experience a true success.  Opening in spring 2023, our Newberry, MI golf course, will be ready for you to enjoy 7 days a week with year-round events and activities.  We look forward to receiving your request for information or answer any of your questions.
